original_title: Bala... Dapat Kay Cris Cuenca, Public Enemy No. 1
overview: Cris Cuenca (RAMON REVILLA) is a poor, oppressed and hard-working family man. He tries to stay out of trouble to be able to provide for his family. But the unkind world drives him into action -- nurturing anger and hatred. Cris Cuenca becomesa criminal. Armed with a desert eagle and a talisman that protects him from bullets, Cuenca becomes an assassin and a drug lord
title: Bala... Dapat Kay Cris Cuenca, Public Enemy No. 1
